subprocess_flow.description: The customer onboarding process begins immediately after a new customer signs up for the SaaS product. This involves setting up the customer's account, providing initial training, and ensuring they understand the basic functionalities of the software. The goal is to make the customer feel welcome and confident in using the product.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To ensure new customers are properly set up and trained to use the SaaS product.
subprocess_flow.scope: Encompasses all activities related to setting up a new customer's account and providing initial training.

step_risks_and_controls.risk: Incomplete onboarding leading to customer frustration

subprocess_flow.description: Providing ongoing support to customers is crucial for addressing their questions, resolving issues, and ensuring they continue to derive value from the SaaS product. This includes responding to support tickets, providing technical assistance, and offering guidance on best practices. The aim is to maintain high levels of customer satisfaction and prevent churn.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To provide continuous support and assistance to customers, ensuring they derive maximum value from the SaaS product.
subprocess_flow.scope: Encompasses all activities related to addressing customer inquiries, resolving issues, and providing technical assistance.

step_risks_and_controls.risk: Delayed or inadequate support leading to customer dissatisfaction
step_risks_and_controls.control: Service level agreements (SLAs) and support ticket prioritization

governance_requirements: Regular monitoring of support ticket resolution times

subprocess_flow.description: Developing and delivering customer training programs is essential for ensuring customers fully understand and utilize the SaaS product's features. These programs can include webinars, online courses, and in-person training sessions. The goal is to empower customers to maximize their use of the product and achieve their desired outcomes.
success_criteria: High attendance rates for training programs
Positive customer feedback on training content
Increased product usage among trained customers
subprocess_flow.purpose: To provide comprehensive training programs that enable customers to fully utilize the SaaS product.
subprocess_flow.scope: Encompasses all activities related to developing and delivering customer training programs.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Regular review and update of training materials

governance_requirements: Regular review of training program effectiveness

subprocess_flow.description: Proactively engaging with customers helps identify potential issues before they escalate and ensures customers are continuously deriving value from the SaaS product. This involves regular check-in calls, usage data analysis, and personalized recommendations. The objective is to build strong customer relationships and foster long-term loyalty.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To proactively engage with customers, identify potential issues, and ensure they continuously derive value from the SaaS product.
subprocess_flow.scope: Encompasses all activities related to proactively engaging with customers and providing personalized support.

step_risks_and_controls.risk: Lack of proactive engagement leading to customer churn
step_risks_and_controls.control: Regular check-in calls and usage data analysis

governance_requirements: Regular monitoring of customer engagement metrics

subprocess_flow.description: Implementing effective customer retention strategies is critical for minimizing churn and maximizing customer lifetime value. This includes loyalty programs, personalized offers, and continuous improvement of the SaaS product based on customer feedback. The goal is to ensure customers remain satisfied and continue to renew their subscriptions.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To implement effective strategies that minimize churn and maximize customer lifetime value.
subprocess_flow.scope: Encompasses all activities related to implementing customer retention strategies.

step_risks_and_controls.risk: Ineffective retention strategies leading to customer churn
step_risks_and_controls.control: Regular review and optimization of retention strategies

governance_requirements: Regular monitoring of churn rate and CLTV
